articles.title: Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Congratulates Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, sent a message of greeting to Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC, Monday.
					 Kim Jong Un in his message extended warm congratulations to Xi Jinping and through him to the Central Committee of the CPC and the government and people of the PRC on the 55th anniversary of the Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance between the DPRK and the PRC on behalf of the Workers' Party of Korea and the government and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 The treaty signed by the leaders of the elder generation of the two countries 55 years ago has become a firm legal foundation for constantly consolidating the friendly and cooperative relations that were forged in the bloody struggle for independence against imperialism and for socialism, the message said, and went on:
					
					 It is the consistent stand of our party and the government of the DPRK to consolidate the bilateral relations of long historical roots.
					
					 We will develop the bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation in line with the requirements of the new century together with the Chinese comrades and thus positively contribute to propelling the cause of socialist construction in the two countries and ensuring peace and security in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Availing myself of this opportunity, I sincerely wish you and the Chinese people bigger success in the efforts for the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Xi Jinping
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, Monday received a message of greeting from Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China (CPC), president of the People's Republic of China (PRC) and chairman of the Central Military Commission of the PRC.
					 The message extended sincere congratulations and best wishes to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the WPK and the government and people of the DPRK on behalf of the CPC and the government and people of China on the 55th anniversary of the Sino-DPRK Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance.
					
					 Both sides of China and the DPRK have supported and closely cooperated with each other over the past 55 years on the principle of the treaty and in its spirit and have promoted the cause of construction in the two countries and the steady development of the relations between the two countries, the message said, and went on:
					
					 The Sino-DPRK friendship serves as a precious wealth common to the two sides.
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the party and the government of China to steadily consolidate the traditional bilateral relations of friendship and cooperation.
					
					 The Chinese side together with the DPRK side has willingness to boost the strategic understanding, promote exchanges and cooperation, continue to develop the bilateral relations and thus bring well-being to the two countries and their peoples.
					
					 I sincerely wish the Korean people fresh steady successes in the work of various fields for state development and construction under the leadership of the WPK headed by you.
					
					 I hope for the prosperity of the DPRK and happiness and security of its people.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Raul Castro Ruz
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Cuba, on July 10.
					 The message extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Un upon his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 It extended the noblest regards to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malian Party Leader
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Un from Malian Party Leader
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the  DPRK, received a congratulatory message from Tiemoko Sangare, chairman of the African Party for Solidarity and Justice of Mali, on July 5.
					 Tiemoko Sangare in his message extended the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on his election as chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK at the recent Fourth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on behalf of all the members of the African Party for Solidarity and Justice of Mali and on his own behalf.
					
					 Kim Jong Un's election to the top post of the state is a manifestation of deep trust and expectation of all the Korean people towards him, the message said.
					
					 It sincerely wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness and the Korean people greater success in their struggle for reunifying the country and building a socialist power.

articles.title: DPRK Government Sends Message to U.S. Government
articles.content:
DPRK Government Sends Message to U.S. Government
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government sent the U.S. government a message on July 10 through the DPRK permanent mission to the UN in connection with the fact that the U.S. recently impaired the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK by releasing what they call "report on human rights" and "list of targets of special sanctions" related to the DPRK.
					 The DPRK government in its message clarified its stand to take practical actions as already declared in the statement of the Foreign Ministry.
					
					 The message vehemently denounced the recent U.S. sanctions measure which impaired the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK as the most hideous criminal act and a declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					 Now that the U.S. refused to comply with the DPRK's demand for the immediate withdrawal of the sanctions measure, the DPRK government notified the U.S. that it would take practical actions against the U.S. stage by stage as already clarified and would totally cut off New York DPRK-U.S. contact channel, the only official contact channel, at the first phase, the message said.
					
					 The DPRK government informed the U.S. government of its principled stand that from now on it would deal with all the issues arising in the DPRK-U.S. relations under wartime law of the DPRK and the issue of detained Americans is no exception and the U.S. is wholly to blame for the ensuing unpleasant things happening in the bilateral ties.

articles.title: Artillery Bureau of General Staff of KPA Strongly Warns against U.S. and S. Korea's Decision to Deploy THAAD
articles.content:
Artillery Bureau of General Staff of KPA Strongly Warns against U.S. and S. Korea's Decision to Deploy THAAD
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group decided to deploy THAAD despite the unanimous opposition and rejection of the DPRK and many other countries.
					 The Artillery Bureau of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army (KPA) declared in a strong warning on Monday:
					
					 The THAAD deployment is a direct product of the sinister ambition of the U.S. to dominate the world by holding its military hegemony in the Asia-Pacific region and the south Korean puppet group's vicious moves to escalate the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north in a bid to invade the north, backed by its master.
					
					 Under the pressure of the U.S. master the Park Geun Hye group decided to introduce the unfinished THAAD whose military effectiveness has not been verified and which may cause casualties by superpower radio waves by paying huge funds running into astronomical figures collected from the south Korean people as taxes. This clearly proves that the Park regime is a group of traitors without equals.
					
					 The Artillery Bureau of the General Staff of the KPA serves the following strong warning to the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers upon the authorization:
					
					 Firstly, the DPRK will take a physical counter-action to thoroughly control THAAD, aggression means of the U.S. for world domination, from the moment its location and place have been confirmed in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. had better understand that the more massively it introduces war weapons to south Korea and its vicinity, the closer they will come into the firing range of the KPA and the more miserable end the U.S. will meet without even a moment to make a shrill cry.
					
					 The KPA possessed of sufficient latest offensive strike means will take more merciless and powerful successive corresponding measures against the U.S. keen to ignite a war by deploying THAAD and will make the warmongers suffer from the nightmare of extreme uneasiness and terror.
					
					 Secondly, the south Korean puppet forces' introduction of THAAD of the U.S. master would precipitate their miserable self-destruction due to the merciless strike of the KPA.
					
					 Their attempt to ward off the KPA's strike of justice with THAAD only reveals military ignorance and amounts to mocking and deceiving the public and people's mindset.
					
					 The KPA has long put not only all the aggressive war means of the enemies but even their attack and logistic bases against the DPRK in the precision sighting strike range.
					
					 The desperate efforts of the Park Geun Hye group of traitors to keep offering south Korea as its master U.S. nuclear outpost would only result in cutting short its despicable remaining days by itself. 
					
					 We once again warn the enemies that it is the steadfast will of the KPA to make merciless retaliatory strikes to reduce south Korea to a sea in flames, debris once an order is issued.
					
					 Thirdly, our revolutionary armed forces will as always bolster up its might in every way on the forefront for safeguarding the peace and security not only on the Korean peninsula but also in Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 It is the noble duty of the KPA to guarantee the peace and security of the world.
					
					 Our powerful Paektusan revolutionary army will never pardon the aggressive war moves of the outrageous U.S. and its henchmen but continue taking bold military measures.
					
					 The KPA will take ceaseless self-defensive steps to punish all injustice in the world threatening justice till the gangster-like U.S. and other hostile forces are wiped out to the last man.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Warns U.S. of Its Moves for Nuclear War
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Warns U.S. of Its Moves for Nuclear War
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry released a statement on Monday as regards the U.S. ever more undisguised military moves to render the situation on the Korean Peninsula extremely tense.
					 The U.S. already introduced Stennis and Ronald Reagan nuclear carrier task forces, nuclear-powered submarine Mississippi, B-52Hs and other strategic assets into the vicinity of south Korea. Recently it announced a plan to conduct drills under the simulated conditions of striking major military facilities of the DPRK by transferring 12 F-16s under the 169th flying corps from the U.S. mainland to the Osan Air Force base in south Korea. 
					
					 This proves that the U.S. seeks to bring dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean peninsula at any cost by staging joint military drills with the south Korean puppet forces in August and its scenario has entered into the phase of its implementation.
					
					 The U.S., seized with an anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and the daydream of carrying out its strategy for world domination, seeks to turn the peninsula into a theatre of a thermonuclear war and thus implement its aggressive pivot-to Asia-Pacific strategy in real earnest.
					
					 The U.S. officially decided to deploy THAAD in south Korea to achieve this objective.
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. to retain its military edge in the Asia-Pacific and realize its wild ambition for dominating it while staging aggressive war drills with the DPRK as its primary target and stepping up the arms buildup and the creation of a military bloc.
					
					 Due to such U.S. saber-rattling, peace and security on the peninsula and in the region are seriously threatened and the danger of a nuclear war is becoming a reality.
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. madcap moves to plunge the peninsula into a nuclear disaster but take stronger countermeasures to defend the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation and peace.
					
					 Should the U.S. provoke a nuclear war on the peninsula, it will inevitably face a baptism of nuclear strike before anybody else.

articles.title: Spokesman for DPRK Human Rights Body Calls for Haling Park Geun Hye Group into Court
articles.content:
Spokesman for DPRK Human Rights Body Calls for Haling Park Geun Hye Group into Court
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea Monday gave an answer to the question raised by KCNA as regards the recent disclosure of the fact that the Park Geun Hye regime of south Korea put pressure on media in a bid to cover up its crimes when the ferry Sewol case sank in south Korea.
					 Short time ago, media trade unions of south Korea opened to public the fact that Ri Jong Hyon, former senior secretary for publicity of Chongwadae, made a phone call to the director of the press department of KBS which broadcasted the poor rescuing operation by the puppet marine police at the time when the ferry Sewol sank in April 2014 to force him to delete and reedit the contents of the report, saying that Park Geun Hye watched the report.
					
					 The above-said case is not a mere accident in the sea but a horrible disaster in which hundreds of people lost their lives at the same time due to inhuman act and incompetence of the Park Geun Hye regime, the spokesman said, and went on: 
					
					 The then puppet marine police and other authorities concerned started a rescue operation late and even deliberately neglected it though there was enough time to rescue passengers before the ferry sank.
					
					 They insulted the families of the victims as "politically-motivated agitators" and "corpse dealers" and brutally cracked down on the people from all walks of life demanding the probe into the truth behind the case, terming them "the Reds instigated by the north" and "the undesirable Leftist forces following the north."
					
					 The recently disclosed case clearly proves once again that the ferry Sewol disaster is a product of the unpopular rule pursued by the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The activities of the Ad Hoc Committee for Probing the Truth behind the Ferry Sewol Disaster were bound to end without any result. This was also attributable to the vicious obstructive moves of the Park group to cover up its sinister crimes.
					
					 Every sin brings punishment to it.
					
					 The south Korean people of different social standings should bring the man-killing Park group to the trial of the people and deal a stern punishment to it, not pardoning its desperate efforts to cover up the truth behind the ferry disaster.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Informs Asian Diplomatic Envoys of Current Situation
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Informs Asian Diplomatic Envoys of Current Situation
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Monday held a meeting to inform the diplomatic envoys of Asian countries here of the situation as regards the fact that the U.S. has recently driven the situation on the Korean peninsula to an unpredictable phase while perpetrating illegal hostile acts of insulting dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK over the "human rights issue".
					 Present at the meeting were ambassadors of Laos, Cambodia, Malaysia, Indonesia, Iran, India and Vietnam and the charge d'affaires ad interim of the Pakistani Embassy here. 
					
					 Choe Hui Chol, director general of the Asian and Oceanian Department of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK, referred to the principled stand of the DPRK on the recent moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. dared take issue with the supreme leadership of the DPRK on July 6 when opening to public the report of the Department of State related with the "human rights issue" of the DPRK peppered with false stories and fabrications and the list of targets of special sanctions of the Department of Treasury pursuant to it, he said, stressing this is an open declaration of a war against the DPRK as it is the worst hostile act far beyond confrontation over the "human rights issue".
					
					 Now that the U.S. crossed the "red line" in an all-out confrontation with the DPRK while slandering dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the latter can never remain a passive onlooker to this, he said, adding: Proceeding from this, the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK on July 7 stated that in case the U.S. does not lift the current sanctions, all diplomatic contact space and channels between the DPRK and the U.S. will be cut off immediately and the toughest measures to resolutely smash the U.S. hostile acts will be taken.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the south Korean puppet forces are steadily escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula as evidenced by the decision to deploy THAAD in south Korea in league with the U.S. despite the  strong protest of the DPRK and its neighboring countries, he stressed that all Asian countries should be vigilant against this, clearly understand who is the ringleader and chief criminal driving the situation on the peninsula to an unpredictable phase and neither sympathize nor join in action harmful to the regional peace and stability.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of Asian countries expressed deep understanding of the fact that the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK is rendering the situation on the Korean peninsula and in the region extremely tense.

articles.title: Japanese Regional Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference Formed
articles.content:
Japanese Regional Preparatory Committee for Joint Conference Formed
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The north side preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages from the north and the south and abroad for peace and independent reunification of the Korean peninsula issued a press release on Monday. 
					 According to it, the Japanese regional preparatory committee for the joint conference of political parties, organizations and individual personages from the north and the south and abroad was formed in Tokyo on July 8.
					
					 The Japanese regional preparatory committee sent a letter to organizations and personages of different regions abroad on behalf of its chairperson calling for promoting the formation of regional preparatory committees and inaugurating the overseas side preparatory committee.

articles.title: Seminar Held on World Population Day
articles.content:
Seminar Held on World Population Day
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- There took place a seminar at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday to mark 2016 World Population Day.
					 Present at the seminar were officials in the fields of public health and education, those of ministries, national institutions, working people's organizations and public organizations, school youth and children in Pyongyang, the acting representative of the United Nations Population Fund and members of missions of international organizations and staff members of foreign embassies here.
					
					 The speakers emphasized the importance of the position and role of the growing generation in social progress, expressing their expectation that the seminar would be a good opportunity to accelerate the achievement of Sustainable Development Goals set by the UN.
					
					 Presentations were made on the demographic characteristics of the teenage girls in the DPRK and the global sustainable development goals for young people.
					
					 The Population Center of the DPRK released a special issue of Population Newsletter.

articles.title: Development of Special Zone for International Tour Progresses Apace in DPRK
articles.content:
Development of Special Zone for International Tour Progresses Apace in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) ? Big efforts have been channeled into developing Mubong area into a special zone for international tour in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 In this regard, Kye Song Nam, vice-chairman of the Korea Economic Development Association, told KCNA:
					
					 The special zone for international tour of Mubong covers an area of 20 square kilometers. It will boast of hotels, a race track, golf course, hot water bathroom, shower bath place and vacationland.
					
					 A project for electricity supply system was already finished in the zone in cooperation with a foreign business.
					
					 Construction of all infrastructures will be completed in a few years.
					
					 Foreigners can carry on business activities solely in the special zone in conformity with the DPRK Law on Economic Development Parks.
					
					 The DPRK government has taken a measure to reduce land lease charge and business income tax for foreign businesses which invest in building infrastructures and make high-tech products in the special zone.
					
					 Many foreign businesses have already expressed their willingness to take part in developing the special zone for international tour of Mubong, he said.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Crewmen of Chinese Taipei-flagged Ship
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Crewmen of Chinese Taipei-flagged Ship
 Nampho, July 11 (KCNA) -- A remembrance meeting was held by crewmen of the Chinese Taipei-flagged ship at Nampho Port on Monday on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The participants laid a floral basket before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in Nampho and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Speeches were made at the meeting participated by the captain and crewmen of the Chinese Taipei-flagged ship Zhang Hong 1.
					
					 The speakers said that Kim Il Sung embarked upon the road of revolution with the great intention to retake the country in his teens, defeated the Japanese imperialists and liberated the country.
					
					 They said that he was the greatest man who founded the immortal Juche idea, built a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence and dedicated his all to the country's prosperity, the people's happiness and the cause of global independence till the last moments of his life.
					
					 They expressed belief that the brighter future would be in store for the Korean people who are demonstrating the might of the invincible politico-ideological power and military power under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Drive for Product Quality Improvement Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Drive for Product Quality Improvement Brisk in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Different economic sectors of the DPRK are making big efforts to improve product quality and ensure domestic production of equipment.
					 The September Textile Mill replaced imported equipment and attachments with home-made ones, increasing the production 1.7 times over the same period of last year.
					
					 The Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory updated its instant noodle production process with home-made equipment and facilities.
					
					 The Taedonggang Foodstuff Factory, which won national quality medals and international ISO 22000, has striven to boost the production of world-famous goods through a technical innovation movement. It perfected a method for excellent Korean gin production and manufactured various effective facilities to improve the quality of products and ensure their hygienic safety on a higher level.
					
					 The Pyongyang Sports Apparatus Factory introduced domestic equipment and facilities to considerably raise the yield ratio in the production of ten kinds of gloves and 40 kinds of balls.
					
					 Similar achievements were also made at the Pupho Offshore Farm and other economic units.

articles.title: Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Is Entirely Up to U.S., South Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Denuclearization of Korean Peninsula Is Entirely Up to U.S., South Korean Authorities: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet group are not entitled at all to talk about the "north's denuclearization" as they are the arch criminals who spawned and worsened the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The noisy fuss being made by the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye puppet group in south Korea over the "nuclear threat from the north" under the pretext of the "north's denuclearization" is nothing but an act of giving vent to their anger at the situation where they have become unable to recklessly wield nuclear stick any longer in face of the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 The U.S. has threatened and blackmailed the DPRK with nukes since the 1950s, spawning the nuclear issue on the peninsula and frantically staging nuclear war drills against the DPRK, and the south Korean puppet group has blindly toed the U.S. line, betraying the country and nation. They should seriously reflect on their past crimes and stop silly raising a hue and cry over the "north's denuclearization".
					
					 Explicitly speaking again, the DPRK has consistently maintained the stand that the whole peninsula including south Korea and its vicinity should be denuclearized.
					
					 It is absolutely intolerable for the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye regime to persistently spout sophism about the "north's denuclearization" in a bid to mislead the public opinion.
					
					 If the U.S. and the south Korean authorities waste time with foolish trumpeting about the "north's denuclearization," doggedly disregarding the DPRK's principled demand, they will only throw more hurdles in the way of the denuclearization of the peninsula.
					
					 The denuclearization of the peninsula entirely hinges on the attitude of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Regime Comes under Fire for Inventing "Spy Case"
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Regime Comes under Fire for Inventing "Spy Case"
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Now the south Korean puppet forces are busy with building public opinion on what they call a "spy case."
					 The south Korean newspaper Choongang Ilbo reported that the Intelligence Service "arrested an agent who used to supply information on the situation to the north."
					
					 The reptile press, including Yonhap News, have also built baseless public opinion, talking about "a spy camouflaged as a clergyman" and "conspirator."
					
					 Gentries of the "Saenuri Party" from the Intelligence Committee of the "National Assembly" said they are going to "disclose the arrest of a spy by the Defense Security Command."
					
					 The south Korean puppet authorities, the "Saenuri Party" and conservative media are all resorting to such a smear campaign as an invention of the "spy case" but no one will be deceived by the third-rate plot, a commentary of Rodong Sinmun on Monday says, and continues:
					
					 The "spy case" invention farce is prompted by the black-hearted intention of traitor Park Geun Hye, a heinous confrontation maniac and fascist dictator.
					
					 As already known, the anger of the south Korean people at the treacherous rule by the puppet traitor has reached an intolerable point.
					
					 With the anti-"government" struggle being waged by the people from all walks of life every day across south Korea in demand of the vital rights, democracy and the improvement of the north-south relations, she tries to find her way out in intensifying the fascist suppression of the people and anti-DPRK plot rackets.
					
					 Upset by the anti-"government" struggle of the people, the puppet group invented another fictitious "spy case" in a bid to divert elsewhere the criticism of it and weather the crisis by the creation of terror-ridden atmosphere.
					
					 The Park group's groundless farce can never prove successful. This will be an eye-opener for the south Korean people and accelerate the overturn of the treacherous regime.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Stop Behaving Recklessly
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Stop Behaving Recklessly
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Japan staged a sea-patrol plane joint drill for tracking the DPRK's submarine together with south Korean puppet forces in Atsugi base in Japan proper. As for P-3C which participated in the drill, it is known as a major means for holding the command of the sea in an emergency as it has a vast radius of operation and high-tracking capacity.
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Monday observes:
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries claim that the joint military drill did not pose any threat to anybody as it was a routine and friendly military exchange but their claim is little short of clumsy rhetoric.
					
					 Japan staged the military drill targeting the DPRK by bringing south Korean puppet forces even into its proper for the purpose of realizing its scenario for staging a comeback to the Korean peninsula at any cost by using the Park Geun Hye group hell-bent on the confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north, backed by its U.S. master
					
					 The Park regime, the worst group of traitors, is now seized with the way of thinking that it does not care about reducing the whole land of south Korea to the theater of outsiders in order to bring down the DPRK.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are mulling using this despicable calculation of the south Korean regime for reinvading the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK will never pardon those reactionaries to flout the destiny of the nation.
					
					 It has powerful ultra-modern attack means capable of blowing up any moment any place of the world where the enemies of the nation are stationed. 
					
					 In case the Japanese reactionaries kick off their reinvasion, the whole land of Japan will be reduced to debris in a moment.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries would be well advised to stop behaving recklessly.

articles.title: Third Meeting of 9th-term Board of Directors of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Held
articles.content:
Third Meeting of 9th-term Board of Directors of Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification Held
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The third meeting of the 9th-term Board of Directors of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification took place in Tokyo on July 4.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), So Chung On, director of its Department for International Affairs and Reunification, Ri Tong Je, chairman of the association, and representatives of local councils of the association.
					
					 The meeting discussed the measure for the association to make a contribution to opening a wide avenue to independent reunification, true to the new line and policies for national reunification advanced by Marshal Kim Jong Un at the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 Ri Tong Je in a report reviewed the work done by the association to carry out the tasks for national reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in a letter dated May 25, 2015.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The report was adopted as a decision of the Board of Directors at the meeting.
					
					 Nam Sung U said that the DPRK has turned into the strongest nuclear weapons state, bringing about a drastic change in the strategic position of Juche Korea and in the strategic structure of the DPRK-U.S. standoff and that the cause of the Juche revolution and national reunification have entered a new stage.

articles.title: C.C. of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meets
articles.content:
C.C. of Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan Meets
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the third meeting of the 29th Central Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on July 7.
					 Present there were Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan who doubles as chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, and its members and others.
					
					 Kang in her report said that the women's union would make progress in carrying out the three-point patriotic tasks and successfully greet the 70th anniversary of the formation of the women's union next year with patriotic enthusiasm of all its officials and other Korean women in Japan.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 The report was adopted with unanimous approval.
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was read out there.

articles.title: Spokesman for General Association of Koreans in China Calls for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
articles.content:
Spokesman for General Association of Koreans in China Calls for Holding Great National Conference for Reunification
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China in a statement on July 4 recognized the DPRK's proposal to hold a great national conference for reunification in Pyongyang or Kaesong before and after August 15 as the most timely and fair patriotic call for reunification in the light of the demand of the present situation and the Koreans' will for reunification and fully supported and approved it.
					  If the great national conference for reunification is held, constructive opinions and reasonable ways can be discussed in a candid manner to defuse the present extreme confrontation and to bring about a turning phase in carving out the nation's destiny, and the Koreans' movement for independent reunification will be put on a new orbit, the statement said, adding:
					
					 If the south Korean authorities have an iota of national conscience, they should roll back the good-for-nothing policy of confrontation with the nation and come out to the venue of the great national conference for reunification in August in conformity with the compatriots' aspiration and the demand of the era.
					
					 The members of the association will take active part in the great national conference with August 15 as an occasion and dedicate themselves to the patriotic struggle to open up a broad avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in China
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China and its affiliated organizations held events on July 8, the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 There took place an event of laying a floral basket before the statue of Kim Il Sung at Yuwen Middle School in Jilin.
					
					 Present there were officials of the association including Chairwoman Choe Un Bok, members of the Jilin City branch of the association, the DPRK consul general and consuls in Shenyang, officials of the Jilin City People's Government and Yuwen Middle School in Jilin and other personages of China. 
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets in the name of the association, the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang and the school and bunches of flowers before the statue of the President. 
					
					 They looked round the room dedicated to book reading of Comrade Kim Il Sung at Jilin Yuwen Middle School.
					
					 A remembrance meeting of the association was held.
					
					 Present there were officials of the association including Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong and officials of the Liaoning regional association.
					
					 Choe Su Bong read out an article praising the revolutionary career of the President. 
					
					 A letter to Marshal Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 Officials of the Zhongnan Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China and compatriots laid a floral basket before the portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the DPRK embassy in Beijing and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round photos dealing with the revolutionary exploits of the great leaders and the revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Officials of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China visited the Dandong branch of the DPRK Consulate General in Shenyang and laid a floral basket before the portraits of the smiling great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Bulgaria, Myanmar, Italy
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Bulgaria, Myanmar, Italy
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- There took place remembrance meetings, Korean book and photo exhibitions and film shows by the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, Myanmar Medical Research Institute and the organization for friendship and support for the DPRK in Italy on July 4 and 5 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 On display at the venues of the events were photos showing exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works, books and photos introducing achievements of the service personnel and people of the DPRK in the building of a socialist power.
					
					 The participants in the film shows watched Korean films on the revolutionary career and feats of the President.
					
					 The chief of the Bulgarian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism referred in detail the biography of the revolutionary activities of Kim Il Sung. Then speeches were made. The speakers said that he was the benevolent father of the Korean people and prominent leader of the international socialist movement who embarked on the revolution in his early years and devoted all his life to the work for freedom and happiness of the people and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute praised the President as an eternal leader of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives.

articles.title: Seminars on Feats of Kim Il Sung Held in Russia, Germany and Sri Lanka
articles.content:
Seminars on Feats of Kim Il Sung Held in Russia, Germany and Sri Lanka
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Seminars on the feats of President Kim Il Sung took place in Russia, Germany and Sri Lanka on July 5 and 6 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 Present at the seminars were personages of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far East Region and Far Eastern State University of Russia, the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany and Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies and other masses.
					
					 The chairman of the Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in the Far East Region said that Kim Il Sung, founder of the DPRK, was the outstanding statesman and the greatest man boundlessly revered and highly praised by world progressives.
					
					 The chief of the Hannover Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Germany said that Kim Il Sung is immortal in the hearts of the Korean people and other progressives for his undying exploits for the Korean revolution and the cause of socialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Sri Lanka Society for Self-Reliance Studies praised the feats of the President who defeated the U.S. and Japanese imperialists in one generation and turned the DPRK into a power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Remembrance meetings took place in Russia, UK, Serbia and Iceland on July 3 and 4 on the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Present at the meetings were personages and other people of different social standings of those countries.
					
					 The chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia said that 22 years since Kim Il Sung passed away proved the validity of his idea and line. She praised the greatness of the President as outstanding statesman, military strategist and invincible and iron-willed commander.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said that Kim Il Sung was the peerless great man who opened up and glorified modern history upholding the banner of independence. Kim Il Sung who victoriously led the Korean revolution after smashing the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists was the great man of outstanding leadership in the independent era, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that the revolutionary career of Kim Il Sung was the life of the veteran and most tested statesman, indomitable revolutionary and the great man.
					
					 The international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia and the general secretary of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society said the great feats Kim Il Sung performed for the era and mankind will shine long along with the independent era.
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the event held in UK.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Angolan Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Angolan Body
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Angolan Committee for Remembering President Kim Il Sung made public a statement on July 5 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					 The statement said:
					
					 We pay high tribute to the great President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The President fathered the great Juche idea and wisely led the struggle of the Korean people and other progressives to make distinguished contributions to the cause of global independence and socialism.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung lives forever along with the century as he devoted his all to justice, truth and the victory of the cause of human independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Guinean Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Guinean Body
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism made public an information bulletin on July 2 on the occasion of the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 In an article "Kim Il Sung, benevolent image" the bulletin said:
					
					 The benevolent image of President Kim Il Sung with a broad smile on his face comes up first in one's mind when remembering him.
					
					 The sunny smile of President Kim Il Sung which makes people feel ease and pleasant was an expression of the most truthful love and particular tenderness for the people.
					
					 The President with distinguished personality always put on a kind look although he had to tide over unimaginable difficulties and ordeals and suffered bitter sorrows and pains for a long period of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 It was a personality as a great man peculiar to President Kim Il Sung that he warmly treated people with a broad smile on his face and showed deep paternal affection.
					
					 The President open-mindedly and kindly treated not only Korean people but also foreigners without any slightest formality and reserve, with a broad smile on his face. Everyone was attracted by his personality in an instant.
					
					 In another article "Prominent leader of 20th century" the bulletin said Kim Il Sung, peerlessly great man representing the 20th century, was the master in ideology and theory as he fathered the Juche idea, Songun idea to guarantee the opening-up of the independent era and its victorious advance. He was the prominent leader who victoriously led the cause of global independence upholding the banner of independence against imperialism all his life and the world elder statesman boundlessly revered by all people for his noble traits, the bulletin added.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Newspapers
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Russian Newspapers
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Russian newspapers carried special write-ups with the approach of the 22nd anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung with portraits showing his smiling image and other photos.
					 The June 30th issue of Komsomolskaya Pravda carried an article "Great man and famous flower" with the photo of Kimilsungia, flower of the sun.
					
					 It said that several decades have passed since the particularly beautiful flower that conjures up noble feelings was named after the President, detailing about the warm and sincere devotion of all people for Kimilsungia which is blooming all over the world.
					
					 The July issue of the paper Serp I Molot in an article "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea" said Kim Il Sung was the great leader who turned the DPRK into a socialist power and his august name will remain forever in history of Korea.
					
					 The June 28th issue of the paper Kommersant carried an article "President Kim Il Sung and Nobichenko" saying about great love and benevolence shown for internationalist soldier Ya. T. Nobichenko by the President. The story about his noble obligation is being conveyed everywhere as a legend even now.
					
					 The 26th issue of the paper Pravda Primoriya in an article "Brilliant Thinker and Theoretician" said that Kim Il Sung was the most brilliant thinker and theoretician as he performed the greatest feats in the 20th century and was particularly revered by all people.

articles.title: Korean War Crimes of U.S. Imperialists Denounced
articles.content:
Korean War Crimes of U.S. Imperialists Denounced
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and internet homepages carried articles denouncing the Korean War crimes of the U.S. imperialists between June 24 and July 1 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					 The British newspaper The New Worker in an article said:
					
					 It is 66 years since the U.S. imperialists unleashed a war of aggression in Korea.
					
					 The war ignited by the U.S. imperialists to nip the young DPRK in the bud and realize its ambition for world domination was the most brutal and destructive one as they massacred Korean people and turned the territory of the DPRK into ashes.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' atrocities in the Korean War put into the shade the shuddering crimes committed by the Hitler fascist clique in their brutal, cruel and violent nature.
					
					 However, the U.S. imperialists could not bring the heroic Korean people who turned out true to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung into submission but bent their knees before the Korean people.
					
					 Far from drawing due lesson from the bitter defeat in the Korean War, the U.S. imperialists persist in their moves for a new war, obsessed with the ambition for aggression of Korea.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrence is a measure for protecting itself.
					
					 Peace of the Korean peninsula is guaranteed by the nuclear deterrence of the DPRK.
					
					 The Venezuelan paper Vea, internet homepage of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, and internet website of the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea referred to the facts disclosing the true colors of the U.S. as provocateur of the Korean war and aggressor, and said the U.S. imperialists have distorted the truth about the outbreak of the Korean war.

articles.title: Swiss Bodies Blast U.S.-led Anti-DPRK Moves
articles.content:
Swiss Bodies Blast U.S.-led Anti-DPRK Moves
 Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on July 3 in denunciation of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges' frantic moves to stir up the atmosphere of anti-DPRK sanctions and pressure.
					 Of late, the U.S., Japan and south Korean puppet group held a briefing on the implementation of the illegal anti-DPRK sanctions without any authorization from the UN Secretariat and Security Council, the statement denounced, and went on:
					
					 The UNSC "resolutions on sanctions against DPRK" are an outcome of the U.S. hostile policy and criminal documents blatantly violating the sovereignty and vital rights of the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers should not misjudge that their sanctions and pressure can work on the DPRK.
					
					 They will prove futile in the DPRK which is guided by the Juche idea and where fresh achievements are being made one after another at the Mallima speed.
					
					 The DPRK's nuclear deterrence will get stronger both in quality and quantity as long as the U.S. escalates nuclear threat and sanctions.
					
					 We denounce the U.S. and its followers for their moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un envia mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, envio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion a Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh. 
					La misiva senala:
					
					En ocasion del 55o aniversario de la concertacion del tratado sobre la amistad, cooperacion y ayuda mutua entre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Popular China, envio las calurosas felicitaciones a Vd., y por su conducto, al Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y el gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Popular China, en nombre del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el gobierno y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					El dicho tratado firmado hace ahora 55 anos por los lideres de veterana generacion de ambos paises, constituye el firme fundamento juridico para  consolidar y desarrollar permanentemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion establecidas en el camino de la lucha sangrienta por la independencia antiimperialista y el socialismo. 
					
					Consolidar y desarrollar la amistad Corea-China de larga historia es la invariable posicion de nuestro partido y gobierno de la Republica. 
					
					Desarrollaremos junto con los companeros chinos las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion Corea-China conforme a la demanda del nuevo siglo para promover la causa de construccion del socialismo de los dos paises y hacer contribucion activa a defender la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad, deseo de todo corazon mayores exitos en los trabajos de Vd. y el pueblo chino por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de felicitacion de Xi Jinping
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 11 Xi Jinping, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de China y Presidente de la Republica Popular China y de la Comision Militar Central de la RPCh.
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Estimado companero Kim Jong Un
					
					En representacion del PCCh y el gobierno y pueblo chinos, envio sinceras felicitaciones y excelentes votos a Vd. y por su conducto, al PTC y el gobierno y pueblo de Corea con motivo del 55o aniversario de la concertacion del tratado sobre la amistad, la cooperacion y la ayuda mutua China-Corea.
					
					Durante 55 anos pasados, ambas partes apoyaron mutuamente y cooperaron estrechamente conforme al principio y espiritu del tratado, aceleraron la causa de construccion en los dos paises e impulsaron la profundizacion y desarrollo incesantes de las relaciones bilaterales.
					
					La amistad China-Corea es un valioso patrimonio comun de ambas partes.
					
					El partido y el gobierno de China mantienen firme su orientacion de fortalecer y desarrollar continuamente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre dos paises.
					
					La parte china esta dispuesta a intensificar con la parte coreana la comunicacion mutua de opiniones estrategicas, promover el intercambio y la colaboracion y desarrollar sin parar las relaciones bilaterales, de manera que haya bienestar para los dos paises y sus pueblos.
					
					Deseo de todo corazon que bajo la direccion del PTC encabezado por Vd., el pueblo coreano logre nuevos y continuos exitos en los trabajos de varios dominios por el desarrollo y la construccion del Estado.
					
					Formulo votos por la prosperidad de la RPDC y la felicidad y tranquilidad del pueblo coreano.

articles.title: Gobierno coreano remite aviso al estadounidense
articles.content:
Gobierno coreano remite aviso al estadounidense
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, Estados Unidos hizo publicos el llamado "informe de Derechos Humanos" y la "lista de objetos de sancion especial", en los cuales se atrevio a menoscabar la dignidad de la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Al respecto, el gobierno de la RPDC envio el dia 10 por conducto de su representacion permanente ante la ONU un mensaje al gobierno estadounidense avisandole que se tomaran las contramedidas de accion como se ha expuesto ya en la reciente declaracion del MINREX.
					
					En el mensaje, el gobierno de la RPDC condeno categoricamente la ultima "medida de sancion" de EE.UU. considerandola como crimen mas grave y declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					Puesto que EE.UU. no ha aceptado nuestra demanda de que cancelara de inmediato esa "medida de sancion", tomaremos por etapas, como ya se ha declarado, las contramedidas de accion y como primer paso, cerramos el canal de contacto RPDC-EE.UU. de Nueva York, el unico que vino existiendo oficialmente entre ambos paises, notifico.
					
					Desde ahora, seran tratados todos los problemas que surjan en las relaciones bilaterales segun la ley del tiempo de guerra de nuestro pais, sin excepcion al asunto de estadounidense retenido, informo. 
					
					Recaeran sobre EE.UU. todas las responsabilidades que emanen del lamentable desenvolvimiento de las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU., he aqui nuestra posicion de principios, finalizo.

articles.title: Direccion de Artilleria de EMG de EPC advierte a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Direccion de Artilleria de EMG de EPC advierte a EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- A pesar de la oposicion y el rechazo unanimes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y otros paises del mundo, los Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos decidieron al fin y al cabo el emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea.
					En su advertencia importante publicada el dia 11, la Direccion de Artilleria del Estado Mayor General del Ejercito Popular de Corea revelo que la ubicacion de THAAD es un producto directo de la maligna ambicion de EE.UU. tendiente a lograr el dominio mundial al tomar la hegemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico y las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida de los titeres surcoreanos que intentan realizar la agresion al Norte bajo el amparo de su amo gringo.
					
					Doblegada por la coaccion de su amo, la banda de Park Geun-hye decidio introducir dedicando el colosal impuesto cruel el incompletado sistema THAAD que todavia no fue verificado suficientemente su eficiencia militar y causa las perdidas humanas por la onda de gran potencia, lo que demuestra que los titeres surcoreanos devienen la horda de los traidores sin precedentes bajo este cielo.
					
					Por el encargo, la Direccion de Artilleria del Estado Mayor General del EPC advierte a los belicistas norteamericanos y surcoreanos como lo siguiente:
					
					Primero, tomaremos las medidas fisicas para aplastar por completo el THAAD, medio de agresion de EE.UU, desde el momento en que se confirman su posicion y lugar de emplazamiento de THAAD en el Sur de Corea.
					
					El pais norteamericano debe saber que cuanto mas despliega los equipos belicos en el Sur de Corea y su contorno, tanto mas se aproxima a nuestro blanco, tanto mas sera exterminado tragicamente sin tener el tiempo de lanzar gritos de terror.
					
					Nuestro ejercito dispuesto suficientemente de los sofisticados medios de golpe ofensivo tomara una tras otra las mas implacables y fuertes medidas de enfrentamiento contra EE.UU. que esta entregado a la provocacion de guerra ubicando THAAD y los belicistas estaran siempre en la infinita pesadilla.
					
					Segundo, con la introduccion de THAAD de su amo norteamericano, los titeres surcoreanos recibiran nuestras despiadadas lluvias de fuego, adelantando asi su fin tragico de autodestruccion.
					
					El intento de detener con el THAAD a nuestro golpe de justicia es una expresion de ignorancia militar y deviene una burla y engano a la opinion publica y la poblacion surcoreana.
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo, nuestro ejercito tomo en su blanco no solo todos los medios de guerra de agresion de los enemigos, sino tambien las bases de ataque a la RPDC y de abastecimientos militares.
					
					Cuanto mas la banda traidora de Park abandona el Sur de Corea como la base avanzada nuclear de EE.UU., tanto mas anticipara voluntariamente su fin tragico.
					
					Reafirmamos la voluntad inmutable de nuestro ejercito que si le toca la orden convertira en un mar de fuego y monton de cenizas con el indiscriminado golpe de represalia.
					
					Tercero, en el futuro tambien, nuestras fuerzas armadas revolucionarias fortaleceran por todos los medios su poderio en la linea avanzada del frente por la defensa de la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana, la region del Noreste de Asia y el resto del mundo.
					
					Mantener la paz y la estabilidad del mundo es la noble obligacion de nuestro ejercito.
					
					Nuestro poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu no perdonara ni en lo minimo las crueles maniobras de guerra agresiva de EE.UU. y sus lacayunas, sino tomara sin cesar las  medidas militares.
					
					Nuestras medidas autodefensivas para castigar todas las injusticias del mundo que amenazan la justicia se continuaran hasta eliminar totalmente a EE.UU. y las fuerzas hostiles.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC advierte a EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC advierte a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que se torna cada dia mas siniestro el movimiento militar de Estados Unidos encaminado a llevar al extremo la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 11 una declaracion:
					Segun la nota, EE.UU. ya introdujo en el contorno del Sur de Corea el colectivo de ataque de portaaviones nucleares Stennis y Ronald Reagan, los cazabombarderos estrategicos B-52H y otros bienes estrategicos de diferentes tipos. Y hace poco, publico el plan de emplazar en la base aerea militar de Osan del Sur de Corea 12 cazas F-16 pertenecientes a la aviacion no.169 en el territorio principal estadounidense para librar el simulacro de ataque a los principales objetos militares de la RPDC. 
					
					El hecho demuestra que EE.UU. intenta acarrear a toda costa el nubarron de la guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana con motivo de los ejercicios belicos conjuntos que se libraran en agosto junto con los titeres surcoreanos, y ya entro en la practica para el respecto. 
					
					Enloquecido por la anacronica politica de hostilidad a la RPDC y por la irrealizable estrategia de hegemonia mundial, EE.UU. trata de convertir la Peninsula Coreana en el campo de guerra termonuclear a favor de su estrategia agresiva sobre Asia-Pacifico. 
					
					En este contexto, decidio oficialmente emplazar en el Sur de Corea el sistema de defensa antimisil THAAD. 
					
					EE.UU. se entrega a los ejercicios belicos, al aumento armamentista y la fabricacion de bloque militar tomando por primer blanco de ataque a la RPDC, y al mismo tiempo, intenta mantener la hegemonia militar en la region de Asia-Pacifico y lograr la ambicion dominacionista.
					
					Debido a tales maniobras, se ven amenazadas gravemente la paz y la seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y se cierne el peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					No observaremos con brazos cruzados las fanaticas maniobras de EE.UU. encaminadas a acarrear los desastres de la guerra nuclear a la Peninsula Coreana y tomaremos las contramedidas de autodefensa mas poderosas para defender la paz, la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion. 
					
					En caso de que el imperio americano provoque la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana, recibira primero el castigo nuclear.

articles.title: CRPP revela naturaleza terrorista de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP revela naturaleza terrorista de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de la ACNC formulada el dia 10 en relacion con que en estos dias, la banda de Park Geun-hye recrudece las maniobras de confrontacion fratricida hablando de la "posibilidad de terrorismo del Norte de Corea", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) dio la siguiente respuesta:
					En la reunion del "Consejo de Ministros" convocada el dia 4 en Chongwadae, la mandataria surcoreana solto unas tonterias tales como "ninguna zona esta segura del terrorismo", "el Norte de Corea intenta cometer los actos terroristas de diferentes formas a fin de sembrar la discordia en el interior de la sociedad surcoreana" y "hay que hacer preparativos en el punto de vista de que estan inminentes las acciones terroristas del Norte".
					
					Con anterioridad, en la primera reunion del Comite  "Estatal" de Medidas contra el Terrorismo el premier surcoreano disparateo que "existe preocupaciones de que el Norte de Corea secuestrara a los surcoreanos en el ultramar o perpetrara el terrorismo por conducto de la organizacion internacional de terrorismo" y "ya hace mucho tiempo aparecio tal sintoma".
					
					Tales insistencias locas de la banda titere surcoreana en el "terrorismo del Norte de Corea" es la otra grave provocacion politica contra la RPDC y una locura conflictiva.
					
					Tambien, deviene una sofisteria absurda para volver la flecha de la censura de la poblacion surcoreana hacia la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Park Geun-hye es el colectivo de terroristas y horda de los criminales antieticos que hacen desesperados esfuerzos por insultar y derrocar la dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC organizando los grupos terroristas como la "Sociedad para Destruir las Estatuas de Bronce" e infiltrando los espias y elementos subversivos y de sabotaje 
					
					 Por mucho que la banda surcoreana hable tan ruidosamente de la "posibilidad de terrorismo del Norte", nadie le prestara la naturaleza de si misma que se dedica a la denigracion a los connacionales y la presion fascista y se entrega solo al terrorismo y el secuestro.
					
					La banda titere debe saber claramente que la vil farsa intrigante destinada a poner a la RPDC la gorra del "criminal terrorista" le causara la severa sentencia de toda la nacion.
